{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SMC |model=SMC7004VWBR |revision=v2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/16/2003 |manuf_country= |manuf=Accton |manuf_model=WG3005D |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=HEDWG3005DACC |ic_id=3857A-WG3005DA |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9 |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=ADMtek |cpu1_model=ADM8628 |cpu1_cspeed=75 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=ADMtek |wi1_chip1_model=ADM8628 |wi1_chip2_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip2_model=RF3000 |wi1_chip3_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip3_model=RF2958 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=ADMtek |sw_model=ADM6996 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=SMC |default_ssid_regex=^SMC$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} [http://www.smc.com/index.cfm?event=viewProduct&cid=1&scid=3&localeCode=EN_BEL&pid=952 Product page for the V.2 EU model] :[http://www.smc.com/files/AH/SMC7004VWBRV2_LR_E.pdf Manual]
Per the manual, the default SSID is '''SMC'''. By default, there is no password for the Web configuration interface.
